thread.title: Roethlisberger listed as questionable

author: Monster storm makes landfall as category 5 in Mexico
title: Roethlisberger listed as questionable
text:
Roethlisberger listed as questionable USA Today Sports 18 hrs ago Â© Charles LeClaire, USA TODAY Charles LeClaire, USA TODAY Pittsburgh QB Ben Roethlisberger has been listed as questionable for Sunday.
AdChoices Roethlisberger had limited practices with the team this week and Landry Jones is still expected to start for the Steelers against the Kansas City Chiefs.
The Steelers have a big AFC North game against Cincinnati next Sunday.
In other notable injury news on Friday, from reports around the league:
- Cowboys WR Dez Bryant officially listed as doubtful for Giants game. He didn't practice Wednesday, Thursday or Friday.
- Giants WR Odell Beckham Jr. (hamstring) has been listed as questionable for Sunday's game vs. Cowboys. He has not practiced all week, but coach Tom Coughlin said on Thursday that will not prevent Beckham from playing on Sunday.
- Browns cornerback Joe Haden is still going through concussion protocol and has been ruled on Sunday against the Rams.
- The status of Lions RB Joique Bell (ankle) remains a mystery. He went through a full practice Wednesday, but was lmited on Thursday. On Friday morning, coach Jim Caldwell would only say, "check the report." Bell has missed the last three games.
- Eagles rookie WR Nelson Agholor (ankle) is out for Sunday's game vs. Carolina.
- Jets CB Buster Skrine (concussion) is listed as porbable for Sunday's game vs. New England.
- Panthers get DE Jared Allen (back) back, but rookie LB Shaq Thompson (knee) is not expected to play.
Eric Prisbell contributed to this story.
